Module W3
Package w3.adv

Class AdvanceTicket

java.lang.Object
w3.abstr.Ticket
w3.adv.AdvanceTicket
public class AdvanceTicket extends w3.abstr.Ticket
This class represent a category of ticket. An advance ticket can only be purchase 1 or more days in advance before the Event.
Author:
Jacky Chun Kit Siu

  • Constructor Details

    • AdvanceTicket

      public AdvanceTicket(int number, int numOfDaysLeft)
      Constructor initializes the member variable daysBeforeEvent and the member variable price. It uses the super construct to pass the parameter number to the parent constructor there by initializing a ticket number for itself. It passes the parameter numOfDaysLeft to the function setDaysBeforeEvent to set the member variable daysBeforeEvent.
      Parameters:
      number - --An Integer value that is pass on to the parent constructor
      numOfDaysLeft - --An Integer value representing the number of days before the Event.

      public void setDaysBeforeEvent(int numOfDaysLeft)
      sets the number days before the Event.
      Specified by:
      setDaysBeforeEvent in class w3.abstr.Ticket
      Parameters:
      numOfDaysLeft - --when implemented it is going to receive an integer; A member variable of the Class TicketMain whose value is generated by a class method setNumOfDaysLeft of TicketMain

    • toString

      public String toString()
      an overloaded toString() method. Returns a String that contain the information on the printed out ticket Should it be printed on the console.
      Specified by:
      toString in class w3.abstr.Ticket
      Returns:
      a String -- containing the ticket number, ticket price, number of days in advance.
